revised_title: Radioactive Phenomena in Ancient Micas: Pleochroic Haloes and Reversal Theory
tldr: The author examines radioactive phenomena in ancient micas, focusing on pleochroic haloes and the reversal theory. They observe various effects, such as bleaching and darkening, in these haloes and discuss the possible explanations for these phenomena. The author believes that the reversal theory best explains the observations, suggesting that a similar effect may occur in very ancient haloes with strongly radioactive nuclei.
